data.description:
The Sea net Hotel is situated perfectly for easy accessibility to the business and entertainment centres of Telaviv, successfully combining the charm and ambience of a "boutique style" hotel. The 70-room hotel provides everything a business trip could require. Restaurants, trendy shopping centres and the enchanting seaside promenade are all a short walk away.
 
70 rooms designed with comfort and practicality in mind. All have en-suite bathrooms with bath or shower. Amenities include air conditioning, cable TV, personal room safe, hair dryer, direct- dial phone with voice-mail. All rooms have ADSL internet connection, and coffee making facilities.
 
A roof top terrace and sundeck facing the Mediterranean Sea is the perfect spot to end the day with drinks, and it can be booked for special events. Business meetings of up to 25 people can be conducted in the hotel's conference room, which is well equipped with the latest audio visual equipment.

items.name: Abraham Tel Aviv
items.description:
Welcome to Abraham Tel Aviv. Situated at the intersection of the city, a mere 50 meters away from the vibrant Rothschild Boulevard in the trendy Electric Garden neighborhood, our location is unbeatable. Within walking distance, you'll discover the beach and Old Jaffa, and the main cultural attractions of the city.

Since 2016, Abraham Tel Aviv has consistently ranked among the top-rated hostels in Tel Aviv, making it a favorite among travelers

We offer a variety of accommodations to suit your preferences. All our rooms feature air conditioning, fast and complimentary WiFi, and en-suite bathrooms.

Every reservation includes a complimentary breakfast, sparing you the need to pay for extras. Begin your mornings with a delightful Israeli buffet breakfast served in the first-floor lounge from 7:30 to 10:00

items.name: Blue Sea Marble
items.description: Only 100 metres from a beach, Blue Sea Marble is located in the heart of Tel Aviv. It offers air-conditioned rooms and free Wi-Fi access is provided. Rooms here feature a flat-screen cable TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Some come with a sea view. Breakfast is served in a nearby hotel, 3 minutes walk from Blue Sea Marble hotel Numerous bar and restaurants can be enjoyed in the vicinity. The well-known Carmel Market is a 10-minute walk from the Blue Sea Marble.

items.name: Joseph Hotel TLV
items.description: Set in Tel Aviv and within 800 metres of Alma Beach, Joseph Hotel TLV has a shared lounge, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi. The property is located 1.2 km from Charles Clore Beach, 2.3 km from Givat Aliya Beach and 1.6 km from Suzanne Dellal Center for Dance and Theater. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, all guest rooms at Joseph Hotel TLV have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms also offer a seating area. At the accommodation all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at Joseph Hotel TLV will be able to enjoy activities in and around Tel Aviv, like fishing. Independence Hall Museum is 2.8 km from the hotel, while Nachalat Benyamin Crafts Fair is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ben Gurion Airport, 12 km from Joseph Hotel TLV.

specialOffers.title: **PACKAGE RATE**, Continental breakfast, Free breakfast, Free WiFi

items.hotelName: Play Sea Port Hotel Tel Aviv
items.name: Standard Double
Play Sea Port Hotel Tel Aviv
items.description: Set 500 metres from sandy beaches, PLAY Seaport Suite Hotel TLV offers modern-style accommodation with sea views in Tel Aviv. Featuring free WiFi throughout, it is located 700 metres from the port. PLAY Seaport Suite Hotel TLV offers air-conditioned rooms and suites with LCD flat-screen TV and cable channels. Free toiletries are provided in all bathrooms. Some have a balcony, while others come with a seating area. The property offers a 24-hour front desk. The Eretz Israel Museum and Kikar Hamedina are both located 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Ben Gurion International Airport, a 30-minute drive away from the property.

items.name: Brown TLV Urban Hotel
items.description: Property Location With a stay at Brown TLV Urban Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Tel Aviv, steps from Tel Aviv Stock Exchange Building and Shalom Meir Tower. This 4-star hotel is close to Carmel Market and Hatachana Compound.Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 30 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Bathrooms have rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages and body treatments. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including a spa tub and a fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services.Dining Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/caf serving guests of Brown TLV Urban Hotel. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges.Business, Other Amenities Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and a computer station. Planning an event in Tel Aviv? This hotel has facilities measuring 323 square feet (30 square meters), including a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.

items.name: Oliver
items.description: Located in Tel Aviv, Oliver is 700 metres from Independence Hall Museum and offers various facilities, such as a shared lounge. The property is situated 1.3 km from Nachalat Benyamin Crafts Fair. The property is set in the Tel Aviv City-Centre district. At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower, while some units at Oliver also feature a balcony. At the accommodation, the rooms have air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. A continental breakfast is served at the property. Suzanne Dellal Dance Show Centre, Neve Tzedek is 1.4 km from Oliver. Ben Gurion Airport is 22 km from the property.

items.name: Seanet Hotel Tel Aviv
items.description:
The Sea net Hotel is situated perfectly for easy accessibility to the business and entertainment centres of Telaviv, successfully combining the charm and ambience of a "boutique style" hotel. 70 rooms designed with comfort and practicality in mind. All have en-suite bathrooms with bath or shower. Amenities include air conditioning, cable TV, personal room safe, hair dryer, direct- dial phone with voice-mail. All rooms have ADSL internet connection, and coffee making facilities.
 
A roof top terrace and sundeck facing the Mediterranean Sea is the perfect spot to end the day with drinks, and it can be booked for special events. Business meetings of up to 25 people can be conducted in the hotel's conference room, which is well equipped with the latest audio visual equipment.

items.name: Hotel 75
items.description: Hotel 75 is located in Tel Aviv, 200 metres from Nachalat Benyamin Crafts Fair and Shenkin Street. Free WiFi is available throughout. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. There are a private bathroom with hairdryer, nad coffee and tea making facilities in each room. Light breakfast is served daily at the hotel's coffee shop and includes a sandwich, vegetables, muesli, 1 hot beverage, 1 cold beverage, and a sweet dessert. The area is popular for windsurfing and cycling. Shenkin Street is 300 metres from Hotel 75, while Independence Hall Museum is 500 metres away. Ben Gurion Airport is 12 km from the property.

items.name: Numa Hotel
items.description: Set 700 metres from Alma Beach, Numa Hotel Jaffa offers 4-star accommodation in Tel Aviv and features a terrace. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Private parking is available on site. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Numa Hotel Jaffa offers certain units that feature a balcony, and rooms are equipped with a kettle. At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Numa Hotel Jaffa offers a buffet or vegetarian breakfast. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Charles Clore Beach, Aviv Beach and Suzanne Dellal Center for Dance and Theater. The nearest airport is Ben Gurion Airport, 12 km from Numa Hotel Jaffa.

items.hotelName: DAVE GORDON SON OF A BROWN
items.name: Standard Double
Dave Gordon TLV
items.description: Brown Hotels' new rebel child, is a Low cost budget boutique hotel designed for fun loving urbanites eager to explore Tel Avivian life. Located on the bustling corner of Gordon and Ben Yehuda Streets, just a two-minute walk from the Mediterranean Sea, the Dave is merely steps away from the city's best in food, bars and shops. Dave offers playful aesthetics celebrating of 1970's, with each room housing its own eclectic assortment of flea market finds and funky antiques fill the spaces.

items.name: Dizengoff Garden Hotel
items.description: Property Location A stay at Dizengoff Sea Residence places you in the heart of Tel Aviv, walking distance from Gordon Gallery and Bauhaus Center. This aparthotel is close to Gordon Beach and Frishman Beach.Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 14 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include desks and blackout drapes/curtains, and housekeeping is provided daily.Business, Other Amenities Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, laundry facilities, and an elevator (lift).

items.name: Oliver

The property is situated 1.3 km from Nachalat Benyamin Crafts Fair. The property is set in the Tel Aviv City-Centre district. At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower, while some units at Oliver also feature a balcony. At the accommodation, the rooms have air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. A continental breakfast is served at the property. Suzanne Dellal Dance Show Centre, Neve Tzedek is 1.4 km from Oliver. Ben Gurion Airport is 22 km from the property.

items.name: Seanet Hotel Tel Aviv
items.description:
The Sea net Hotel is situated perfectly for easy accessibility to the business and entertainment centres of Telaviv, successfully combining the charm and ambience of a "boutique style" hotel. The 70-room hotel provides everything a business trip could require. Restaurants, trendy shopping centres and the enchanting seaside promenade are all a short walk away.
 
70 rooms designed with comfort and practicality in mind. All have en-suite bathrooms with bath or shower. Amenities include air conditioning, cable TV, personal room safe, hair dryer, direct- dial phone with voice-mail. All rooms have ADSL internet connection, and coffee making facilities.
 
A roof top terrace and sundeck facing the Mediterranean Sea is the perfect spot to end the day with drinks, and it can be booked for special events. Business meetings of up to 25 people can be conducted in the hotel's conference room, which is well equipped with the latest audio visual equipment.

items.name: Hotel 75
items.description: Hotel 75 is located in Tel Aviv, 200 metres from Nachalat Benyamin Crafts Fair and Shenkin Street. Free WiFi is available throughout. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. There are a private bathroom with hairdryer, nad coffee and tea making facilities in each room. Light breakfast is served daily at the hotel's coffee shop and includes a sandwich, vegetables, muesli, 1 hot beverage, 1 cold beverage, and a sweet dessert. The area is popular for windsurfing and cycling. Shenkin Street is 300 metres from Hotel 75, while Independence Hall Museum is 500 metres away. Ben Gurion Airport is 12 km from the property.

items.name: Numa Hotel
items.description: Set 700 metres from Alma Beach, Numa Hotel Jaffa offers 4-star accommodation in Tel Aviv and features a terrace. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Private parking is available on site. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Numa Hotel Jaffa offers certain units that feature a balcony, and rooms are equipped with a kettle. At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Numa Hotel Jaffa offers a buffet or vegetarian breakfast. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Charles Clore Beach, Aviv Beach and Suzanne Dellal Center for Dance and Theater. The nearest airport is Ben Gurion Airport, 12 km from Numa Hotel Jaffa.

items.hotelName: DAVE GORDON SON OF A BROWN
items.name: Standard Double
Dave Gordon TLV
items.description: Brown Hotels' new rebel child, is a Low cost budget boutique hotel designed for fun loving urbanites eager to explore Tel Avivian life. Located on the bustling corner of Gordon and Ben Yehuda Streets, just a two-minute walk from the Mediterranean Sea, the Dave is merely steps away from the city's best in food, bars and shops. Dave offers playful aesthetics celebrating of 1970's, with each room housing its own eclectic assortment of flea market finds and funky antiques fill the spaces.

Numa Hotel Jaffa offers certain units that feature a balcony, and rooms are equipped with a kettle. At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Numa Hotel Jaffa offers a buffet or vegetarian breakfast. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Charles Clore Beach, Aviv Beach and Suzanne Dellal Center for Dance and Theater. The nearest airport is Ben Gurion Airport, 12 km from Numa Hotel Jaffa.

items.description: Brown Hotels' new rebel child, is a Low cost budget boutique hotel designed for fun loving urbanites eager to explore Tel Avivian life. Located on the bustling corner of Gordon and Ben Yehuda Streets, just a two-minute walk from the Mediterranean Sea, the Dave is merely steps away from the city's best in food, bars and shops. Dave offers playful aesthetics celebrating of 1970's, with each room housing its own eclectic assortment of flea market finds and funky antiques fill the spaces.

Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include desks and blackout drapes/curtains, and housekeeping is provided daily.Business, Other Amenities Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, laundry facilities, and an elevator (lift).
